TopicTitle: Hiding Contract Orbits-Sites that are not even accepted.

Articles.Content:
Hello in my tracking station i see a lot of contract orbits or sites that i havent even accepted to do.

Is there any way to hide them? Tnx

23 minutes ago, Boyster said:

Hello in my tracking station i see a lot of contract orbits or sites that i havent even accepted to do.

Is there any way to hide them? Tnx  

You can decline the contract... though that comes with a penalty, and may just spawn another of the same type.

You can wait for the contract to expire out.

Beyond that, I don't know of any way. In my own games, I've just trained my eyeballs to ignore them.

The easiest way is to go into flight mode -- that is, take control of a craft -- and then bring up map mode, instead of using the Tracking Station.

When you are in map mode, all of the unaccepted contracts are filtered out of the display.
I think Tracking Station Evolved allows you to hide those orbits and surface points for both accepted and offered contracts.
